scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run setup:build && npm run twig:build && npm run img:build && npm run js:build && npm run css:build
scripts.css:build: npm run css:compile && npm run css:autoprefix
scripts.css:critical: rm -rf docs/css/critical.css && touch docs/css/critical.css && node scripts/critical-css.js
scripts.dev: npm run build && parallelshell 'npm run watch' 'npm run browsersync'
scripts.twig:watch: watch 'npm run twig:build' src/pages src/partials src/data
scripts.js:build: npm run js:head && npm run js:main
scripts.js:head: uglifyjs src/js/head/*.js -o docs/js/head.min.js
scripts.setup:build: mkdir -p docs && mkdir -p docs/css && mkdir -p docs/js && mkdir -p docs/img
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run twig:watch' 'npm run js:watch' 'npm run css:watch' 'npm run img:watch'
